description: I. Critical care strategy: managing the H1N1 flu pandemic. Sept 2009. Incl. appendices. 30 p. II. Letter [undated] from Andy Burnham MP to Kevin Barron MP regarding critical care and pandemics. 1 p. III. Letter dated 10/09/2009 from Ian Dalton (National Director of NHS Flu Resilience) regarding critical care. 3 p.
